Class IngredientMapper

java.lang.Object
com.cb.backend.mapper.IngredientMapper
public class IngredientMapper extends Object
Mapper class for converting between Ingredient entities and IngredientDto data transfer objects.

Provides methods to convert an Ingredient entity to a DTO, create a new entity from a DTO, and update an existing entity from a DTO.

Handles relationships with Product and Recipe entities, including composite primary keys.

      Converts an IngredientDto to a new Ingredient entity.
      Parameters:

      recipe - the associated Recipe entity
      product - the associated Product entity

    • updateEntity

      public static void updateEntity(Ingredient ingredient, IngredientDto dto, Product product)
      Updates an existing Ingredient entity with data from a IngredientDto.
      Parameters:
      ingredient - the entity to update
      dto - the DTO containing new values
      product - the Product entity associated with the ingredient
